metadata.title: CVE-2020-29040 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Xen through 4.14.x allowing x86 HVM guest OSusers to cause a denial of service (stack corruption), cause a data leak,or possibly gain privileges because of an off-by-one error. NOTE: thisissue is caused by an incorrect fix for CVE-2020-27671.

criterions.comment: xen: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
